item.description:
Please Note: This event has been changed. We will not be meeting to shoot before dinner because of freezing temperatures. Dinner is at Passports Restaurant in Gloucester at 4p.m. Those interested in shooting please utilize the message board to find others who may wish to join you. Looking forward to seeing you all on Saturday!


Announcing a new Meetup for Cape Ann Photography Excursion (CAPE) Group!

What: A Belated CAPE Holiday Shoot, Dinner and Print Exchange

When: Saturday, January 15, 2011 4:00 PM

Fee: $1.00 per photographer

Where: Passports Restaurant
110 Main Street
Gloucester, MA 01930
978-281-3680

As a fun addition to this meetup, for those who are interested, we are going to hold a "gift exchange". Those interested in participating should bring along a matted print of one of your own favorite photographs to exchange. It's a great way to share your photography with the group and spread a little holiday cheer.


The specifics:
- Only your own photography may be exchanged.

- Prints may be of any size, but must be matted.

- Please sign the matte.

- Unwrapping gifts is always exciting, and it adds an element of surprise, so please do wrap the matted print.

- We'll draw names on the day of the event.

- Have fun :-)!


Happy Holidays!

We are looking forward to seeing everyone at our belated CAPE Holiday dinner on Saturday, January 15. We're hoping many of you choose to participate in the gift exchange as well.

This event will take place rain, snow or shine. Please see below for details...

Dinner is scheduled for 4p.m. at Passports Restaurant in Gloucester.

I need to get Passports a more exact count asap. It isn't a large restaurant, and we want to make sure they're prepared for our group, so it's import to have you RSVP in as soon as possible.

Passports Restaurant
110 Main Street
Gloucester, MA 01930
978-281-3680

This is going to be a great event, and we appreciate you taking time out to belatedly celebrate the holidays with us!


RSVP to this Meetup:
http://www.meetup.com...
item.name: A Belated CAPE Holiday Dinner and Print Exchange
